Call of magic

2016-05-15

About

Call of Magic is a multiplayer game I have created as one of the assignments. It focuses around the spell-creation mechanic which makes the entire gameplay an unique experience.

Greenlight

Game have been created with a proper game-design approach in mind, and I have not only been required to create a greenlight document which had to be approved by a tutor but I have also had to log my inputs and evaluate my successes and downfalls as a part of another assignment.



Video

I have also had to create and narrate a video which demonstrates and describes the gameplay. It didn't come out some well due to my low-quality microphone but it allows anyone to get the gist of the gameplay fairly easily so it does serve its purpose.

Check it out on YouTube

Close

Call of Magic is a multiplayer-focused third-person shooter in which the player can take a role of a wizard and unleash deadly magic to slay his foes. One of the unique features of this title is the ability to create customizable spells which can be adjusted to the player's preference.

Another of the spell components - element- allows the player to tweak the spell values slightly. Fire spells deal extra damage, water spells cost less energy, lightning spells briefly stun enemies while earth based spells their targets.

Modifiers allow to tweak the spell effects but are only applied if the spell is successfully landed. Vampiric modifier allows regenerating the health when the target is damaged; insight modifier restores energy, and acid modifier deals damage over time to the target.

There are of course unique spells as well, which allow the player to perform an entirely separate action. For example, blink spell allows the player to teleport a short distance while cloaking spell makes the player invisible.

Feature list

  • Network game with a dedicated server
  • Team based deathmatch
  • (4 elements * 4 types * 3 modifiers)+ 4 Unique = 52 Possible spells!
  • Dynamic spell creation
  • Custom scoreboard
  • Team selection screen
  • Elegant UI
  • Team based outfits

    • And many more...

    Play Expo Blackpool 2016

    I have had the pleasure of presenting the game at the PLAY Expo Blackpool and it was quite as success. Over 30 people have played my game and I have received a lot of good comments (some kids were asking about steam release!) and only one person was truly dissatisfied with the title (but he just got destroyed 5:0 by his son so...). This event made me truly appreciate the game design on a whole different level.
